data.name: Wolfstar Adventures in the Inu System
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Retro-style precision controlled platforming
  • 2D medroidvania-style exploration
  • Fast and fluid melee combat
  • Hand-drawn characters and environments
  • Colorful sci-fi/cyberpunk setting


About the Game

Take control of the young cargo runner, Wolfstar and his companion Bun-E in this sci-fi action adventure platformer. As part of the crew of The Zero Sun, a starship run by the distinguished Captain Olive, travel to various worlds in the Inu System.


Talk to a colorful cast of NPCs to discover the mystery behind the disappearance of the heirs to the Pug Empire.


Explore sprawling sci-fi environments, fighting enemies and unlocking upgrades that will help you defeat the boss of each dungeon.
data.about_the_game:
Take control of the young cargo runner, Wolfstar and his companion Bun-E in this sci-fi action adventure platformer. As part of the crew of The Zero Sun, a starship run by the distinguished Captain Olive, travel to various worlds in the Inu System.


Talk to a colorful cast of NPCs to discover the mystery behind the disappearance of the heirs to the Pug Empire.


Explore sprawling sci-fi environments, fighting enemies and unlocking upgrades that will help you defeat the boss of each dungeon.
data.short_description: A sci-fi action-adventure platformer. Travel the Inu System and talk to a colorful cast of NPCs across various worlds. Explore maze-like levels by running, double jumping, and dashing. Fight off various robotic enemies using special melee attacks, and eventually take down the boss of each dungeon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
